body_html:
@Kelym one of the issues (of error 30) is that the /dev/nvidia* files are not yet correctly initialized. When you use CUDA, it tries to initialize them properly. However, for it to touch the /dev folder, it needs super-user access.
Maybe you can ask your sysadmin to run a small example GPU program under root, so that the driver-level initialization finished correctly.
